decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: S1/2022004 /21: EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN; S1/2022004 /22 REV A: PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS; S1/2022004 /23 REV A: PROPOSED LOFT PLAN; S1/2022004 /24 REV A: EXISTING AND PROPOSED FRONT AND REAR ELEVATIONS;  S1/2022004 /25 REV A: EXISTING AND PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION; S1/2022004 /26 REV A: EXISTING AND PROPOSED OTHER SIDE ELEVATION; S1/2022004 /27 REV A: EXISTING AND PROPOSED ROOF PLANS; S1/2022004 /28 REV A: EXISTING AND PROPOSED BLOCK PLANS; S1/2022004 /00: Site plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved two (2) rooflights to the side roof slope of the dwelling shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policy D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Side roof extension; alteration to roof comprising raising ridge level; installation of window to front roofslope; installation of window to rear roofslope
